name: Pitstop Challenge
description: Pitstop Challenge is a sport game like no other. Your goal is to become the best pitstop crew on the motorsport circuit.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: Core i3 3.1 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Radeon HD6870 with 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core i5-2300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 or Radeon HD7970 with 2 GB VRAM Sound Card: DirectX compatible
